item.title: 投资者现在认为一些公司比政府更安全
item.description: 在 150 万亿美元的全球债券市场上，投资者逐渐得出结论：有些公司甚至比最强大的政府更安全。【原文：In the $150 trillion global bond market, investors are coming to the conclusion that some companies are safer bets than even the most powerful governments.】

item.title: 英国资产面临政治投机风云再起的风险
item.description: 分析师认为，英国最新的政治戏剧对该国资产不利，在有争议的预算案出台前，不确定性正在增加。【原文：The latest UK political drama is negative for the country’s assets, according to analysts, with uncertainties building ahead of a contentious budget.】

item.title: 食品成本下降，印度通胀率降至历史最低点
item.description: 受统计因素和食品价格大幅下降的影响，印度 10 月份的通货膨胀率降至历史最低水平。【原文：India’s inflation rate fell to its lowest level on record in October, driven by statistical factors and a sharp drop in food prices.】

item.title: 雪佛龙为首个人工智能数据中心电力项目选择了西得克萨斯州
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）选择德克萨斯州西部作为其首个为数据中心提供天然气电力的项目所在地，这是该石油巨头利用人工智能蓬勃发展的契机开展新业务的开端。【原文：Chevron Corp. chose West Texas as the site of its first project to provide natural gas-fired power to a data center, the beginning of a new line of business for the oil giant to capitalize on the boom in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: SBB 股票和债券因 34 亿美元的护理院出售而反弹
item.description: 在瑞典房地产集团达成一项34亿美元的交易，将其护理院投资组合出售给一家与SBB关系密切的挪威房地产公司Public Property Invest AS之后，SBB的股票和债券大幅上涨。【原文：SBB shares and bonds jumped after the Swedish real estate group struck a $3.4 billion deal to sell its care home portfolio to Public Property Invest AS, a Norwegian property firm closely linked to SBB.】

item.title: 黄金的 "交易方式就像记忆股票 "将矿商作为杠杆赌注
item.description: 不到一个月前，黄金从每盎司近 4400 美元的历史高点跌落，现在黄金开始卷土重来。根据 22V Research 的分析，这种反弹对矿业公司的股票来说是个好兆头。【原文：After tumbling from an all-time high of almost $4,400 an ounce less than a month ago, gold is starting to make a comeback. And that rebound bodes well for shares of miners, a cohort of stocks that acts as a levered bet on the metal’s fortunes, according to an analysis from 22V Research.】

item.title: 塞内加尔与加蓬、莫桑比克一起成为濒临债务危机的非洲三国
item.description: 塞内加尔债券跌至历史新低，使这个西非国家陷入债务困境。【原文：Senegalese bonds plunged to fresh record lows, placing the West African nation into debt-distress territory, according to a measure widely considered to be the threshold that locks countries out of global capital markets.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商 D-Matrix 获卡塔尔和新加坡 EDBI 投资，估值 20 亿美元
item.description: 微软公司支持的人工智能芯片初创公司D-Matrix Corp.从包括卡塔尔投资局和新加坡EDBI在内的新投资者那里筹集了2.75亿美元，公司估值达20亿美元。【原文：D-Matrix Corp., a Microsoft Corp.-backed AI chip startup, raised $275 million from new investors including Qatar Investment Authority and Singapore’s EDBI, valuing the company at $2 billion.】

item.title: 思科正接近其 Dot-Com 高峰。能否成功取决于人工智能
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc. investors have waited more than 25 years for this moment, with the stock trading at levels last seen during the peak of the dot-com era.】

item.title: 尽管贸易休战，中国对美国大豆的采购仍在停滞
item.description: 中国对美国大豆的采购似乎已经停滞，而在此之前不到两周，美国刚刚宣布了一项范围广泛的贸易休战协议，这标志着世界上最大的两个经济体之间的关系正在解冻。【原文：China’s purchases of American soybeans appear to have stalled, less than two weeks after the US touted a wide-ranging trade truce that signaled thawing relations between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 印度农业交易所获准建立新的共同基金平台
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度国家商品及衍生品交易所有限公司（一家农产品在线交易所）已获得董事会批准，将推出一个电子共同基金分销平台。【原文：India’s National Commodity and Derivatives Exchange Ltd., an online bourse for agricultural products, has received approval from its board to launch an electronic mutual fund distribution platform, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赞比亚中央银行五年来首次降低利率
item.description: 赞比亚中央银行自 2020 年 8 月以来首次下调了关键利率，因为它预计通货膨胀将进一步缓解。【原文：Zambia’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for the first time since August 2020 as it projects inflation will ease further.】

item.title: 战争导致赤字扩大，俄罗斯将首次出售人民币债券
item.description: 俄罗斯计划在下月初首次发行人民币计价的政府债券，这凸显了俄罗斯为重整受制裁影响的经济并帮助弥补今年创纪录的财政缺口所做的努力。【原文：Russia plans to offer its first yuan-denominated government bonds early next month, underscoring efforts to retool its sanctions-hit economy and help cover a record fiscal shortfall this year.】

item.title: 台湾表示正在评估芯片出口限制措施的未来用途
item.description: 台湾表示，它正在评估在外交努力中使用芯片出口管制的可能性，这表明它并没有完全放弃这个它曾短暂威胁要对南非使用的工具。【原文：Taiwan said it is assessing the possibility of using chip export controls in its diplomatic efforts, a sign it has not completely abandoned a tool that it briefly threatened to deploy against South Africa.】

item.title: 杰里-诺伊曼谈现在投资人工智能的问题.
item.description:
它可能不会让你致富。【原文：

It's probably not going to make you rich.

】

item.title: 石油在海上的十亿桶积累表明制裁压力巨大
item.description: 在全球海洋上堆积的十亿桶石油中，有大量原油来自受到某种制裁的国家，这表明制裁措施正在一定程度上扰乱石油贸易。【原文：A buildup of a billion barrels of oil on the world’s oceans includes a disproportionately large amount of crude from nations subject to some kind of sanctions — a sign the measures are bringing a degree of disruption to the oil trade.】

item.title: 奇货可居诺伊曼谈为什么人工智能不会让你致富（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居诺伊曼谈为什么人工智能不会让你致富（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Neumann on Why AI Will Not Make You Rich (Podcast)】

item.title: 盛宝称亚洲是投资者寻求人工智能投资的理想之地
item.description: 盛宝市场（Saxo Markets）认为，由于美国科技公司的估值捉襟见肘，寻求投资热门人工智能主题的股票投资者应在亚洲寻找机会。【原文：Equity investors seeking exposure to the hot artificial intelligence theme should look for opportunities in Asia as US tech companies face stretched valuations, according to Saxo Markets.】

item.title: 沃达康与马斯克的 Starlink 公司合作发展非洲宽带
item.description: 南非最大的电话公司沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）合作，在非洲大陆的市场上增加宽带连接。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd., South Africa’s biggest phone company, has partnered with Elon Musk’s Starlink to increase broadband connectivity in its markets on the continent.】

item.title: 西门子计划削减 350 亿欧元核磁共振成像设备制造商股份
item.description: 在西门子公司 350 亿欧元（约合 405 亿美元）的持股拖累其股价之后，西门子公司正在最终确定减持其前医疗设备部门多数股份的方案。【原文：Siemens AG is finalizing options to reduce a majority stake in its former medical equipment unit after the €35 billion ($40.5 billion) holding turned into a drag on its share price.】

item.title: 美国向印度尼西亚归还受辐射污染的鞋类产品
item.description: 美国对印尼出口的鞋类产品进行了铯-137 污染标记，在已经包括虾和丁香的清单上又增加了一种显示辐射迹象的产品。【原文：The US has flagged Indonesian exports of footwear for cesium-137 contamination, adding another product showing signs of radiation to a list that already includes shrimp and cloves.】

item.title: 欧洲财报打破悲观预测，推动股市反弹
item.description: 欧洲第三季度盈利全面超出预期，支撑股市创下历史新高，并提振了人们对 2026 年前景的信心。【原文：European third-quarter earnings have exceeded expectations across the board, supporting stocks at record highs and boosting sentiment on the outlook for 2026.】

item.title: 据说创新光源将为香港最大的上市项目之一挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国光通信模块和设备制造商中际创新光通信有限公司（Zhongji Innolight Co.【原文：Zhongji Innolight Co., a Chinese maker of optical communication modules and devices, has picked banks for a Hong Kong listing that could raise $3 billion or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰勒温培警告英国预算猜测影响房屋销售
item.description: 英国最大的房屋建筑商之一泰勒温贝公司（Taylor Wimpey Plc）警告说，即将于11月公布的预算案中可能出现的税收变化的不确定性正在削弱住房市场。【原文：Taylor Wimpey Plc, one of Britain’s biggest housebuilders, warned that uncertainty about potential tax changes in the upcoming budget in November is weakening the housing market.】

item.title: 法国央行将上调国内生产总值预测以增强经济活力
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，由于法国经济继续表现出抵御政治动荡的韧性，法国央行可能会上调今明两年的经济增长预期。【原文：France’s central bank is likely to raise growth forecasts for this year and next as the economy continues to show resilience to political turmoil, Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: MUFG 与 OpenAI 合作，加速人工智能在银行服务中的应用
item.description: 日本最大的银行宣布与 OpenAI 合作，加快人工智能的应用，包括在下一财年新开设的数字贷款公司中的应用。【原文：Japan’s largest bank announced a tie up with OpenAI to accelerate its use of artificial intelligence, including in a new digital lender that’s set to open next fiscal year.】

item.title: 南非证交所称，市场飙升表明南非值得上调评级
item.description: 南非证券交易所负责人表示，南非的主权信用评级并没有反映出投资者情绪的改善，他建议 S&P Global Inc.【原文：South Africa’s sovereign credit rating doesn’t reflect improved investor sentiment, the head of the country’s stock exchange said, pitching for an upgrade from S&P Global Inc. as its markets and listings pipeline show signs of a recovery.】

item.title: 投资者对扭亏为盈的热情升温，Eskom 的借贷成本下降
item.description: 衡量 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.信用风险的一项指标已降至一年来的最低点，因为投资者加深了对这家南非国有电力公司在经历多年危机后已转危为安的押注。【原文：A measure of Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.’s credit risk has narrowed to the lowest in a year as investors deepen bets that South Africa’s state-owned power utility has turned a corner after years of crisis.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将维持在历史高位附近
英飞凌预计 2026 年收入增长，人工智能前景促进销售增长
item.description: 英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）预测，随着全球人工智能数据中心的蓬勃发展，其销售前景将在 2026 财年恢复增长。【原文：Infineon Technologies AG forecast revenue will return to growth in the 2026 fiscal year as the global boom in artificial intelligence data centers raised its sales outlook.】
